main event: A couple observed a very bright unidentified light in the sky while driving in the Akron area on June 25, 1966.
interesting points: The light appeared to change colors, resembling an aircraft, seen from their vehicle at high speeds,The witnesses thought the object might have been landing because of its erratic movements,The lights followed their vehicle at a similar speed and altitude for about two minutes before disappearing into the trees,Reports confirmed that the Goodyear blimp was in the area around the same time but puzzled the witnesses as it was flying at night,Other reports and analyses mentioned the possibility of misidentifying the blimp's lights due to atmospheric conditions.
sighted object: very bright light in the sky
witness description: A couple returning home from a trip, observed unusual lights while driving.
